title: Go Tell It On the Mountain beaten gold or silver

content.prompt: By describing the windows as gleaming “like beaten gold or silver” in the middle of the final paragraph, the narrator emphasizes both the physical appearance of the light shining through the windows and the

choices.label: weight of the slowly sinking walls and ceiling of the room
value of the family’s diligent housekeeping despite the ever-present dust
transactional nature of the family’s interactions with each other
lack of money that is the most pressing of John’s worries

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
